appDescription: Comparative analysis between GitLab and GitHub for version control platform migration

overview.title: Comparative Analysis of Git Platforms
overview.subtitle: Detailed comparison between GitLab and GitHub for SHMS modernization
overview.costComparisonTitle: ðŸ’° Annual Cost Comparison (47 users + 30 AI users)

recommendation.title: Development Team Strategic Recommendation
recommendation.subtitle: GitHub Enterprise Cloud
recommendation.description: Proceeding with GitHub Enterprise Cloud represents the most balanced strategic decision. It maximizes the investment already made, offers proven superiority of AI tools for .NET modernization, and eliminates operational overhead identified by the internal team.
recommendation.basisDescription: This analysis was conducted by the development team, considering technical, operational and strategic aspects of the migration, focusing on the continuity of the project already started and the modernization needs of SHMS.

overview.analysisNote: Analysis based on updated market data (August 2025) and company's .NET architecture specificities.

deploymentExplanation.selfHosted: Installation on dedicated VM in Oracle Cloud (4 vCPU, 16GB RAM, 100GB storage)
deploymentExplanation.cloud: Managed service by the platform (GitHub.com or GitLab.com)

deploymentDetails.selfHostedGitLab: VM implementation in Oracle Cloud with GitLab installation. Requires network configuration, security and infrastructure maintenance.
deploymentDetails.selfHostedGitHub: VM implementation in Azure with GitHub Enterprise installation. Requires network configuration, security and infrastructure maintenance.
deploymentDetails.cloud: Platform managed service. No installation, configuration or infrastructure maintenance required. Immediate access via browser.

aiWarnings.noAI: NO AI resources (only Github EE + Copilot)
aiWarnings.selfHostedWarning: AI resources NOT available in Self-hosted solutions

costs.tooltip: Click on column headers to sort the data.

disadvantages.lessControl: Less control over data and infrastructure
disadvantages.dataNotCorporate: Data does not remain in corporate infrastructure
disadvantages.limitedAIvsGitHub: Limited AI resources compared to GitHub Copilot

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence Resources
ai.subtitle: Detailed analysis of available AI tools

introduction.title: Strategic Importance for Modernization
introduction.content: The modernization of our legacy software represents a fundamental strategic challenge for the company. Artificial Intelligence tools have emerged as essential accelerators in this process, offering advanced capabilities for code refactoring, automated framework migration, and proactive vulnerability detection. For the specific context of SHMS and its .NET Framework architecture, choosing the Git platform with adequate AI resources can mean the difference between a costly manual migration and an efficient, data-driven transformation.

ai.copilotDescription: Advanced AI tools that accelerate modernization and code improvements
ai.cloudOnlyWarning: AI resources ONLY available in CLOUD solutions

migrationAssisted.title: Assisted Migration .NET Framework â†’ .NET Core
migrationAssisted.description: GitHub Copilot offers specialized tools to modernize .NET Framework applications to the latest .NET Core versions.
migrationAssisted.impact: Can help us update the system to the latest .NET Core version, bringing immense performance, security and modern functionality improvements to the application.

unitTests.title: Automated Unit Test Generation
unitTests.description: Intelligent creation of unit tests based on existing code context:
unitTests.shortDescription: Automatic creation of comprehensive unit tests, improving code quality and reliability.

features.automaticAnalysis: Automatic analysis of methods and classes

unitTests.impact: Significantly accelerates test creation for SHMS.

modernPatterns.title: Suggestions for Modern Patterns
modernPatterns.description: Automatic suggestions to implement modern patterns and development best practices.

azureIntegration.title: Integration with Azure Services
azureIntegration.description: Specialized assistance for Azure services integration, optimizing cloud-native architecture.

codeAgent.title: Intelligent Code Agent
codeAgent.description: Delegate complete tasks to the GitHub Copilot agent that plans, writes, tests and iterates code automatically using GitHub Actions.
codeAgent.impact: Accelerates development of complex functionalities through intelligent task automation.

multipleModels.title: Multiple AI Models
multipleModels.description: Access to different AI models (Claude 3.5 Sonnet, GPT-4.1, Gemini 2.0) according to the specific task needs.

codeReview.title: Automated Code Review
codeReview.description: Automated code analysis before human review, detecting hidden bugs, vulnerabilities and suggesting improvements.
codeReview.benefit: Significantly reduces code review time and improves SHMS code quality.

intelligentSecurity.title: Intelligent Security
intelligentSecurity.description: Advanced filters that detect vulnerabilities, duplicate code and insecure patterns in real-time during development.

github.multipleModels: Multiple AI models (Claude, GPT, Gemini) as needed
github.automatedReview: Automated code review with advanced bug detection

recommendation.title: AI Resources Recommendation
recommendation.subtitle: GitHub Copilot Enterprise for .NET Modernization
recommendation.description: For the specific context of SHMS and .NET Framework modernization, GitHub Copilot offers decisive technical advantages. With equivalent prices to GitLab Duo Pro, its specialized tools for .NET migration, automated test generation and Visual Studio integration provide superior ROI for code modernization compared to GitLab Duo, which focuses on DevSecOps.
recommendation.technicalDescription: Analysis based on GitHub Copilot's superiority for .NET development, native integration with Azure services, and specific tools for legacy application modernization - critical factors for the success of SHMS evolution.

github.codeReview: Automated code review with bug analysis
github.multipleModels: Support for multiple AI models (Claude, GPT, Gemini)
github.actionsIntegration: Native GitHub Actions and workflows integration

gitlab.includedInEE: GitLab Duo included in EE plans
gitlab.highTotalCost: **Very high total cost compared to GitHub**

scope.title: IS Analysis Scope
scope.description: This analysis was conducted by the Information Security team focusing specifically on On-Premises solutions (in our case, Self-Hosted). Cloud options (GitHub Enterprise Cloud, GitLab Cloud) were not considered in this corporate security assessment.
scope.documentDescription: Access the detailed technical analysis from the Information Security team with all criteria, evaluations and specific recommendations.

gitlabEE.title: GitLab EE Ultimate
consItems: Scanners may be less specialized than dedicated solutions
gitlabEE.evaluationText: Natural evolution with complete DevSecOps suite

githubES.title: GitHub Enterprise Server
githubES.evaluationText: Excellence in specific SAST, higher complexity
githubES.note: For GitHub Enterprise Server to be comparable to GitLab EE in security, contracting the "Advanced Security" add-on is essential. Without it, the platform does not meet several critical security criteria.

recommendations.title: Information Security Recommendation

scenario1.title: Scenario 1: GitLab EE Ultimate
scenario1.description: Natural evolution and low risk. Unified DevSecOps suite with centralized governance. Ideal for operational simplification and integrated vulnerability management.

scenario2.title: Scenario 2: GitHub ES + Advanced Security
scenario2.description: Complex migration with technical excellence. Access to CodeQL (market-leading SAST) and Push Protection, but requires integration of complementary solutions.

recommendations.importantNote: **ðŸ“‹ Important Note:** For GitHub Enterprise Server to be comparable to GitLab EE in security, contracting the "Advanced Security" add-on is **essential**. Without it, the platform does not meet various critical security criteria.

cloudNote.title: Note on Cloud Solutions
cloudNote.description: The **GitHub Enterprise Cloud** and **GitLab Cloud** options were not evaluated in this Information Security analysis, which focused specifically on on-premises solutions to meet the organization's data control requirements.

common.aiWarning: AI resources NOT available in Self-hosted solutions
